skills.skill: Strategic Process Alignment with SAP S4 ERP Implementations
Experience working with IT teams as well as Business Partners

duties_responsibilities.duty: Executing mapping, KPI development, process improvement, and activate methodology that SAP brings in.
Working closely with business partners and IT stakeholders in helping build best practices for midstream and downstream for out of the box SAP S4 IS Oil & Gas.
Responsible and dedicated to the energy transformation that will be enabled by SAP.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in related field (Master's preferred)
